title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 576.5 - Penalties and enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 576.5 - Penalties and enforcement

State Regulations

Any person who violates the provisions of this Part shall
be liable for all penalties and other remedies provided for in the

Environmental Conservation Law including section 71-0703(10). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
576.5

Adopted

New

York State Register May 25, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 21, eff. 5/25/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
